select * from sys_application where 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and (id like '%${key}%' or code like '%${key}%' or name like '%${key}%' or remark like '%${key}%') </#if>
<#if query.id??> and id=${query.id} </#if> <#if query.ids??> and id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if> <#if query.code??> and code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.code)}' </#if> <#if query.value??> and value = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.value)}' </#if> <#if query.name??> and name like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.name)}%' </#if> <#if query.remark??> and remark like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.remark)}%' </#if> <#if query.enable??> and enable = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.enable)}' </#if>
<#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if> <#else> and 1=2 </#if>
